text: cumisha is singapore-based mobile game
developer and publisher we have about
six games in the in the market currently
and we have a team of about 100
developers and artists a double your
support is an extension of our
development team and our engineering
team primarily right now that's how we
treated we do use aw support during our
design phases to help us with identify
problems with our architecture and
basically fine-tune the architecture
that we have for our games there is an
underlying issue somewhere and we are
able to actually identify it before it
affects our art production activities aw
support has enabled us to reduce our
risks to reduce our costs to basically
make sure that we are efficiently
running our operations and we make sure
that our town times are reduced to the
absolute minimum there have been
instances where we've had events planned
and aw support has helped us with making
sure that the backend actually is
prepared to handle that kind of load
that we are expecting in a certain event
it could be a launch it could be a game
event a double your support enables us
to focus on our core activities make
sure that our games are a bug-free are
liked by our players we are able to
focus more on what is required for our
game rather than spend time looking
after our infrastructure
